adv: It's easy to explore, compare and get insights from data when relative views are available. With the filtering option it's more efficient and quick. I guess it will save times when decision should make in a short time.
disadv: Sometimes lots of data with scrolling on a single chart that makes it hard to perceive. Filtering option should not be restricted until no charts are available.
comment: I would like to see other forms of charts instead of dense scatter plot. Because of some technical bugs sometimes labeling are not visible clearly(overlapping), it should be fixed.
